p.codeblock: public abstract int Preload(ref string requestId, Int64 songCode);

section.p: You can call this method to preload the music resource you want to play. After the method is successfully called, the SDK triggers the callback to report events related to the preloaded music resource. Before calling this method to preload a music resource, you need to call the or methods to get the music resource you want to play, and retrieve the music resource code (songCode) from the callback triggered by those methods.

You can call this method to preload the music resource you want to play. After this method is successfully called, the SDK triggers the callback to report the event of preloading the music resource. Before calling this method to preload a music resource, you need to call or to get the music resource you want to play, and retrieve the songCode from the callback triggered by these methods.

You can call this method to preload the music resource you want to play. After the method is successfully called, the SDK triggers the callback to report the preload event. Before calling this method to preload a music resource, you need to call or to obtain the music resource you want to play, and then get the song code (songCode) from the triggered callback.

You can call this method to preload the music resource you want to play. After the method is successfully called, the SDK triggers the callback to report the preload event. Before calling this method to preload a music resource, you need to call the or method to get the music resource you want to play, and obtain the music resource code (songCode) through the triggered callback.
section.note: To destroy the object, call the method after receiving the callback.
To destroy the object, call the method after receiving the callback.
To destroy the object, call the method after receiving the callback.
To destroy the object, call the method after receiving the callback.

plentry.pd: The code of the music resource, used to identify the music resource.
The code of the music resource, used to identify the music resource.
The song code of the music resource, used to identify the music resource.
The code of the music resource, used to identify the music resource.
Output parameter. Request ID. A unique identifier for this request.

section.title: Return Values
section.p: A requestId, which uniquely identifies this request.
A requestId, which uniquely identifies this request.
A requestId, which is the unique identifier for this request.

ul.li: < 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
